purpose: The email is a call for papers for the International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2026 Research Track, inviting high-quality submissions of original and unpublished research in software engineering. The submission deadline is July 18, 2025, and the conference will take place from April 12-18, 2026, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The email outlines important information regarding submission guidelines, review criteria, and the transition to Open Access publishing by ACM starting in 2026.
evidence_sentences: International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) Research Track
ICSE welcomes submissions addressing topics across the full spectrum of Software Engineering, being inclusive of quantitative, qualitative, and mixed-methods research.
IMPORTANT #1: Starting 2026, all articles published by ACM will be made Open Access.
Each paper submitted to the Research Track will be evaluated based on the following criteria: Novelty, Rigor, Relevance, Verifiability and Transparency, Presentation.
